resources.string: Copyright ⓒ 2014-2015 by KENNYSOFT. All Rights Reserved.
Tap on [BACK] button once more to quit.

Play chess immediately in clean design!

 It is a simple chess game. Play chess game simply with basic widgets and without special graphics.

 Chess-7 is used to draw chess pieces.

 Copyright ⓒ 2014-2015 by KENNYSOFT. All Rights Reserved.

v0.8.0 [4] (15.02.17)
 * English translation is added.

 v0.7.0 [3] (15.02.02)
 * A window that shows information when the game ended is added.

 v0.6.0 [2] (15.02.02)
 * En passant error is fixed.
 * Checking Checkmate and Stalemate function is added.
 * Link to used library is added in information window.

 v0.5.0 [1] (15.02.01)
 * First Release.
 # P.S. : Promotion, En passant, Castling, Checking Check is realized.
